# yearForWeekOfYear

**Type Property**

Identifier for the week-counting year unit.

## Declaration

```swift
static var yearForWeekOfYear: NSCalendar.Unit { get }
```

## Discussion

See the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/DateComponents] property [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/DateComponents/yearForWeekOfYear] (or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDateComponents] property [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDateComponents/yearForWeekOfYear] in Objective-C) for a discussion of the semantics of this component.

## Specifying Years and Months

- **era**: Identifier for the era unit.
- **year**: Identifier for the year unit.
- **quarter**: Identifier for the quarter of the calendar.
- **month**: Identifier for the month unit.
- **isLeapMonth**
